name: Euro Stable Token
description: EURST is an ERC-20 live audited euro stablecoin issued by Wallex Trust, asset backed with US Dollars. One EURST provides the equivalent value of 1 Euro. EURST has a mint and redeem functions directly available via its dashboard. EURST has in place a live-attestation system by Armanino, thus providing the maximum level of transparency for the market and its users. Our mission is to provide the most compliant and reliable euro stablecoin to the market.
